tasks.label: Set Function App FQDN
args: & { $fqdn = Read-Host 'Enter Function App FQDN (e.g., func-app-name.azurewebsites.net)'; $appsettingsPath = '${workspaceFolder}/src/McpSamples.OnedriveDownload.HybridApp/appsettings.json'; $content = Get-Content $appsettingsPath | ConvertFrom-Json; $content | Add-Member -NotePropertyName 'FunctionAppFqdn' -NotePropertyValue $fqdn -Force; $content | ConvertTo-Json | Set-Content $appsettingsPath; Write-Host "FQDN updated: $fqdn" }
